statements: UPDATE financial_data SET account_number='123456789', ssn='123-45-6789', credit_card_number='1234-5678-9012' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE financial_data SET credit_card_number='0000-1111-2222-3333', account_number='987654321', ssn='987-65-4321' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE financial_data SET account_number='123456789', credit_card_number='987654321' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE financial_data SET ssn='123-45-6789', encrypted_data='encrypted_string' WHERE account_number='987654321';
UPDATE sensitive_financial_data SET encrypted_ssn = 'xyZ@1234' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET user_id = 1001, action_performed = 'Data Accessed', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:45' WHERE log_id = 101;
UPDATE sensitive_financial_data SET encrypted_credit_card_number = 'abcd1234', encrypted_ssn = 'xyz9876' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = 100.50, timestamp = '2022-04-15 13:30:00' WHERE log_id = 5;

UPDATE Customer SET address='123 Main St, New York' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Account SET balance=500.75 WHERE account_id=101;
UPDATE Customer SET address='123 Main St', name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Account SET balance=1000.50, account_type='Savings' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customer SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction SET amount = 150.75, date = '2022-01-10' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE customer SET email='newemail@example.com', encrypted_ssn='newssn' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE transaction SET amount=1000.50, encrypted_payment_info=E'\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE transaction_id=3;
